data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Redirect your dog when the behavior is inappropriate. If ____ dog ____ loose ____ the ____ park, for ____, ____ is ____ to ____ rude ____ other ____, ____ your ____ and ____ walking ____ away. Your dog should want to be with you and will come.
data.partBlankContent: Redirect your dog when the behavior is inappropriate. If yo__ dog i_ loose a_ the d__ park, for exa____, a__ is star____ to b_ rude t_ other do__, ca__ your d__ and st___ walking bri____ away. Your dog should want to be with you and will come.
data.fullContent: Redirect your dog when the behavior is inappropriate. If your dog is loose at the dog park, for example, and is starting to be rude to other dogs, calm your dog and start walking briefly away. Your dog should want to be with you and will come.
data.answer: 当你的狗的行为不合适时，重新引导它。例如，如果你的狗在狗公园里乱跑，并且开始对其他狗狗无礼，让你的狗安静下来，并开始短暂地走开。你的狗应该想和你在一起，它会来的。
